system_design_prompts.prompt: Design a Twitter-like social media platform that supports posting tweets (280 chars), following users, and a home timeline feed. Expected scale: 50M DAU, 500M tweets/day.
Design Instagram's photo sharing and news feed system. Users upload photos, follow others, and see a ranked feed. Scale: 100M DAU, 50M photo uploads/day, each photo ~2MB.
Design a simple Reddit-like forum with subreddits, posts, comments, and upvotes. Expected: 5M DAU.

Design a flash sale system like Amazon's Lightning Deals. Must handle 100K concurrent users hitting the same product page, with strict inventory consistency (never oversell). Sale events last 15 minutes.
Design a product search and recommendation engine for an e-commerce platform with 10M products. Must support full-text search, filters (price, category, rating), and personalized recommendations.
Design a shopping cart and checkout system. Must handle adding/removing items, applying coupons, calculating shipping, processing payments, and managing inventory reservations.
Design a WhatsApp-like 1-on-1 and group messaging system. Must support real-time message delivery, read receipts, media sharing, and offline message queuing. Scale: 20M DAU.
Design a Slack-like workplace messaging platform with channels, threads, search across message history, file sharing, and integrations. Multi-tenant with 10K organizations, largest org has 50K users.
Design a simple notification system that can send push notifications, emails, and SMS to users based on events in the system. Must handle 1M notifications/day with retry logic.

Design a YouTube-like video sharing platform. Users upload videos, the system transcodes them into multiple resolutions, serves them via CDN, and shows a personalized recommendation feed. Scale: 10M DAU, 100K uploads/day.
Design a live video streaming platform like Twitch. Streamers broadcast to thousands of concurrent viewers. Must support chat, stream recording, and low latency (<5 sec).

Design a payment processing system like Stripe. Must handle credit card charges, refunds, and payouts with exactly-once processing semantics. Must be PCI-DSS compliant. Scale: 10K transactions/second.

Design a stock trading platform that shows real-time prices, accepts buy/sell orders, and maintains user portfolios. Must handle market data from multiple exchanges, order matching, and position tracking.
Design a peer-to-peer money transfer system like Venmo. Users can send money to friends, request money, and maintain a balance. Must handle fraud detection and comply with financial regulations.
Design an Uber-like ride sharing system. Must match riders with nearby drivers in real-time, calculate ETAs, handle surge pricing, and track rides in progress. Scale: 1M rides/day across 100 cities.
Design a food delivery system like DoorDash. Must handle restaurant menus, order placement, driver assignment, real-time delivery tracking, and ETA estimation.
Design a URL shortening service like bit.ly. Must generate short URLs, redirect to original URLs with minimal latency, track click analytics, and handle 100M URLs with 10K new URLs/day.
Design a distributed rate limiter that works across multiple application servers. Must support different rate limit policies per API endpoint and per user tier. Must handle 100K requests/second.
Design a distributed task scheduler like Airflow. Must support DAG-based task dependencies, cron scheduling, retry logic, task priority, and horizontal scaling. Must handle 100K task executions/day.
Design a paste bin service (like Pastebin) where users can create, read, and share text snippets with optional expiration. Scale: 5M pastes/day, average paste size 10KB.
Design a web search engine that crawls pages, indexes them, and returns ranked results for user queries. Must handle 10M pages in the index and 1000 queries/second.
Design a typeahead/autocomplete system for a search box. Must return suggestions within 50ms as the user types. Must support 100K unique queries and handle 10K concurrent users.
Design a smart home IoT platform that collects sensor data (temperature, humidity, motion) from 1M devices sending data every 30 seconds. Must support real-time dashboards and alerting.
Design a fleet management system that tracks 100K vehicles in real-time, stores GPS history, detects anomalies (speeding, route deviation), and provides route optimization.
Design a Google Docs-like collaborative document editor. Multiple users edit the same document simultaneously with real-time cursor tracking and conflict resolution.
Design a Dropbox-like file sync system. Users store files that sync across their devices. Must handle 100M files, detect changes, resolve conflicts, and minimize bandwidth.
Design the backend for a multiplayer online battle royale game with 100 players per match. Must handle real-time position updates, hit detection, and match state at 60 ticks/second.
Design a global leaderboard system for a mobile game with 50M players. Must support real-time rank updates, top-N queries, and friend leaderboards.

Design a real-time ML feature store that serves features for model inference with <10ms latency. Must handle 1M feature lookups/second across 500 feature definitions, with daily batch feature computation and real-time streaming features.
Design an A/B testing platform that can run experiments across web and mobile, track metrics, compute statistical significance, and prevent interaction effects between concurrent experiments.
Design a multi-tenant SaaS analytics dashboard. Each tenant has their own data, custom dashboards, and user management. Must handle 1000 tenants with the largest having 10M events/day.
Design a webhook delivery system for a SaaS platform. When events occur, deliver HTTP callbacks to customer endpoints with retry logic, delivery guarantees, and a management UI.
Design a distributed key-value store like DynamoDB. Must support consistent hashing, configurable replication (N, R, W quorums), conflict resolution with vector clocks, and automatic rebalancing.
Design a distributed object storage system like S3. Must support uploads up to 5TB, versioning, lifecycle policies, and 11 nines of durability. Expected: 1PB total storage, 10K requests/second.
Design a distributed cache system like Memcached. Must support get/set/delete, consistent hashing for distribution, LRU eviction, and handle 1M ops/second across 10 nodes.
Design a metrics collection and alerting system like Datadog. Must ingest metrics from 10K servers, store time-series data, support custom dashboards, and trigger alerts based on threshold rules.
Design a distributed logging system like the ELK stack. Must collect logs from 5K servers, provide full-text search, support structured queries, and retain 30 days of logs.
Design a single sign-on (SSO) and identity management system. Must support OAuth2, SAML, MFA, user provisioning/deprovisioning, and role-based access control for 1M users across 50 applications.
Design a content moderation system that automatically flags inappropriate content (text, images, video) across a social platform with 10M posts/day. Must support human review workflows.
Design a blog platform where users can write posts with rich text, add images, tag posts, and readers can comment. Must support 100K bloggers and 10M readers.
Design a Google Maps-like navigation system. Must support map tile rendering, route calculation (driving, walking, transit), real-time traffic, and place search. Serve 10M route requests/day.
Design a hotel booking system like Booking.com. Must handle search with date/location/price filters, room availability with no double-booking, and payment processing. Scale: 1M bookings/day.
Design a ticket booking system for concerts and events. Must handle seat selection, temporary seat holds during checkout, and high-concurrency releases (100K users for 5K seats).
Design an email service like Gmail. Must handle sending/receiving emails via SMTP, spam filtering, search across mailbox, labels/folders, and attachment storage. Scale: 10M users.
Design a TikTok-like short video feed. Users upload 15-60 second videos, the system serves a personalized infinite scroll feed. Must optimize for engagement. Scale: 30M DAU.

Design a real-time analytics pipeline that ingests clickstream events from a website, processes them, and updates dashboards in near-real-time. Scale: 100K events/second, dashboards refresh every 10 seconds.
Design a change data capture (CDC) pipeline that syncs data from a primary PostgreSQL database to Elasticsearch for search, Redis for caching, and a data warehouse for analytics.
Design a DNS-like distributed name resolution system. Must handle 100K queries/second, support caching with TTL, handle zone transfers, and provide high availability across multiple regions.
Design a CI/CD pipeline system like GitHub Actions. Must support defining workflows in YAML, parallel job execution, artifact storage, caching between builds, and secure secret management.
Design a CRM system like a simplified Salesforce. Must manage contacts, companies, deals with pipeline stages, activity logging, email integration, and reporting. Multi-tenant with 5K organizations.
